problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Betty and Donald left the office together to get some lunch nearby. Betty didn't have another board meeting until 4, and so had plenty of time, but Donald was more rushed and needed to get back to the front desk to greet clients and answer phones within 30 minutes.
Question: Who serves on the board of directors?
ans0: Betty
ans1: Donald
ans2: Not known
